subject: AI & Agents
title: AI Screenwriting and Storytelling Tools
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on AI Screenwriting and Storytelling Tools.

hook.text: A screenwriter is stuck on Act 2. They ask AI for ten possible plot twists. Three are brilliant.

buildup.text: AI tools help writers brainstorm, outline, generate dialogue, and overcome writer's block.

discovery.text: The AI isn't replacing the writer â€” it's generating options for the writer to curate.

twist.text: The 2023 Hollywood writers' strike centered on AI's role in screenwriting and fair credit.

climax.text: The agreement: AI can assist writers but can't receive credit or replace them contractually.

punchline.text: AI generates ideas. Humans choose which ones matter.

quiz.question: What was a key issue in the 2023 Hollywood writers' strike?
options: AI's role in screenwriting and fair credit for human writers
Demand for higher special effects budgets
Actors refusing to work with writers
